error.500: The request failed due to the internal error or wrong configuration.  You can try again later or contact Admin.
error.501: The server doesn't support the request method.  You can try again later or contact Admin.
error.502: The service is currently unavailable due to overload or the network error has been detected. You can try again later.
error.503: The service is currently unavailable due to overload. You can try again later
error.504: Gateway timed out, and cannot connect to the upstream server. You can try again later or contact Admin.
error.505: The current HTTP version is not supported by the server.
error.506: The infinite loop has been detected. You can try again later or contact Admin.
error.507: The server doesn't have sufficient storage space. Please contact Admin.
error.508: The request failed because the server is overloaded. You can try again later or contact Admin.
